description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Office of Equity focuses on improving systemic culture, conditions, and competencies across the district in order to provide each student with the support they need to be successful. The Office includes several targeted programs (African American Male Achievement, African American Female Excellence, Asian Pacific Islander Student Achievement, Latino/a Student Achievement, LGBTQ Programs), community engagement specialists, a translation team, and ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.ousd.org/domain/3262"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"LCAP community engagement","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
